function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of masks and mask production can contribute to environmental waste and pollution","Impact":"Environmental degradation, waste crisis exacerbation, and pollution","Mitigation":"Promote the use of sustainable and biodegradable materials, implement recycling and circular economy principles","Technologies":"Biodegradable materials, recycling technology, circular economy designs","People":"Manufacturers, consumers, and the general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Rapid production and adoption of new mask technologies may lead to quality and safety issues","Impact":"Public health risks, ineffective protection against contagious diseases, and consumer safety concerns","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous testing and quality control, establish industry standards, and provide consumer education","Technologies":"Quality control measures, testing technologies, industry standardization","People":"Manufacturers, regulators, and consumers","Owner":"Manufacturers, government, and regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Promotion of reusable masks may lead to improper maintenance and cleaning, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, public health concerns, and ineffective use of protective equipment","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for cleaning and maintenance, promote education on proper mask use, and design user-friendly cleaning processes","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, user-friendly cleaning technologies, maintenance guidelines","People":"Consumers, healthcare workers, and the general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, healthcare organizations, and public health agencies"}]}
